task_description: 生成中餐米线店堂食3D ICON图标，Pixar卡通风格，展现温馨地道的中式就餐场景

input_data.text_prompt: A professional 3D icon in Pixar cartoon style showing a cozy Chinese noodle shop dining scene. Main elements: a white ceramic bowl (color #F5F5DC) filled with steaming rice noodles in golden broth (#FFD700), a pair of bamboo chopsticks (#D2B48C) resting on bowl edge, small glass condiment bottles including red chili oil (#DC143C), dark vinegar (#654321), and soy sauce. Scene composition: round/square rosewood dining table (#8B4513, #A0522D) with wood grain texture, noodle bowl centered, chopsticks and condiment bottles arranged harmoniously. Visual details: rising steam effect, ceramic bowl with glossy highlights, natural bamboo texture, transparent glass bottles, visible noodles in bowl. Deep blue accent (#2B4A7C) echoing brand identity. 3/4 top-down viewing angle showing complete dining setup. Pure white or transparent background. Lighting: dual light sources from top and 45-degree front. Design philosophy: emphasizing authentic Chinese noodle shop dine-in culture, warm atmosphere, local flavor, fireworks of life, coordinating with noodle bowl icon. Pixar 3D aesthetic with high-resolution details and commercial-grade quality. 1024x1024px square format, perfect for icon usage.
design_requirements: Pixar 3D cartoon aesthetic with soft rounded edges and friendly appearance
Rich Chinese noodle shop cultural characteristics: bamboo chopsticks, ceramic bowl, condiment bottles
Warm and authentic atmosphere conveying local dining experience
Coordinated with noodle bowl icon for brand consistency
Commercial-grade quality with high-resolution details suitable for digital and print use
Clean composition with clear visual hierarchy and balanced element placement
input_data.negative_prompt: flat 2D, photorealistic, dark atmosphere, cluttered composition, blurry details, low resolution, Western dining elements, messy arrangement, unappetizing colors

metadata.notes: 堂食3D ICON图标设计，呼应吼巷米线店品牌IP风格，Pixar 3D卡通美学，强调中餐堂食文化特色
